statements: UPDATE charging_stations SET power_output = 10.5, location = 'Downtown' WHERE station_id = 1;

UPDATE charging_stations SET location = 'Downtown', power_output = 10.5 WHERE station_id = 1;

UPDATE Charging_Usage SET energy_consumed = 50.75, start_time = '2022-09-15 08:00:00' WHERE usage_id = 101;
UPDATE Charging_Stations SET total_chargers = total_chargers + 1, operational = FALSE WHERE station_id = 101;
UPDATE Charging_Usage SET energy_consumed = energy_consumed + 10.5, end_time = '2023-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE station_id = 202 AND user_id = 303 AND start_time >= '2023-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE charging_stations SET location = 'Downtown', num_of_ports = 8 WHERE station_id = 1;
